item.title: Cyberpunk 2077: All X-MOD2 Weapons, Ranked (& Where to Get Them)
item.description:
X-MOD2 weapons are interesting Iconic variants of great guns and melee weapons in Cyberpunk 2077 that provide players with a guaranteed bonus to both handling and the mod slots available, which creates further synergy between V and their choice of weaponry. Yet, there are quite a few X-MOD2 weapons, and players will need to know how to find each and every one of them.

There are 11 X-MOD2 weapons in Cyberpunk 2077 as of Update 2.21, and as such, it’s a good time to jump into Night City and Dogtown and hunt for them all to see how to get them, what their stats are, and what makes them so great when compared to other incredible guns and melee weapons that Cyberpunk 2077 has to offer.

11 MA70 HB X-MOD2

A Heavy Light Machine for Ricochet and Ripping Apart Enemies

Type

Power

Attack Speed

5.6

Damage

50

Reload Speed

3

Effective Range

42

Weapon Handling

5.7

Magazine Size

50

Effects

  • +100% Headshot Damage Multiplier
  • +25% Armor Penetration
  • Slightly reduces movement speed and jump height.
  • Fires explosive rounds.

Iconic Modifier

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachment Slots

  • Mod
  • Mod

  • How to Get: Loot the crashed Militech helicopter near Luxor High Wellness Spaw by opening the door that requires 10 Body Attribute Points.

The MA70 HB X-MOD2 is one of the more recent X-MOD2 weapons that were released after Phantom Liberty, and even with its more modern approach to its design and stats, it seems inferior to the rest. Like most Light Machine Guns, they’re rather difficult to synergize with a build when not acting as a bullet sponge, so this heavy weapon is better left behind for faster playstyles unless players really like standing still and holding down the trigger.

10 Kappa X-MOD2

A Smart Gun Pistol with a Fully Automatic Design

Type

Smart

Attack Speed

8.33

Damage

31.99

Reload Speed

1.32

Effective Range

18

Weapon Handling

6.23

Magazine Size

25

Effects

  • +85% Headshot Damage Multiplier
  • 1sec Lock-on time
  • Fires explosive rounds

Iconic Modifier

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachment Slots

  • Mod
  • Mod

  • How to Get: Complete Spy in the Jungle (Gig) and venture to the stone statue between the Terra Cognita and Luxor Heights Fast Travel Points, where a yellow board can be interacted with 10 Body Attribute Points to find a secret stash.

The Kappa X-MOD2 isn’t the most powerful weapon, but it is a tad interesting. It’s a Smart Pistol that can be used to help with Netrunner builds, and with Cyberdecks, because there’s a benefit there for the Kappa that will see its fully automatic fire rate and its lock-on acquire greater stats. However, the Kappa does suffer since it’s near useless without the right cyberware and without the right Netrunner build, and even with the best cyberware possible, it’s still not going to do all that well.

9 Achilles X-MOD2

A Rare Precision Rifle That Takes a While to Fire

Type

Tech

Attack Speed

5.6

Damage

75

Reload Speed

2.2

Effective Range

85

Weapon Handling

7.1

Magazine Size

12

Effects

  • +175% Headshot Damage Multiplier
  • +50% Armor Penetration
  • 0.75 sec Charge Time

Iconic Modifier

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachment Slots

  • Mod
  • Mod

  • How to Get: Found across the Heavy Hearts Club on a bunk bed behind construction materials.

An upgraded variant of the non-Iconic Achilles, this Precision Rifle might impress with its gold texture, but that’s pretty much it. There aren’t many Iconic Precision Rifles in Cyberpunk 2077 , and this X-MOD2 variant isn’t the best of them, even with its available modifications and headshot damage multiplier due to the charge time needed for it to function.

8 Lexington X-MOD2

The Power Pistol with New Attachments and Bonus Headshot Damage

Type

Power

Attack Speed

8

Damage

42

Reload Speed

0.9

Effective Range

36

Weapon Handling

7.9

Magazine Size

20

Effects

  • +175% Headshot Damage Multiplier

Iconic Modifier

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachment Slots

  • Muzzle
  • Mod
  • Mod

  • How to Get: Obtain first place in Shoot to Thrill (Gig), the shooting competition.

An improvement over other Pistols, somewhat, the Lexington X-MOD2 comes equipped with superior stats and a nice scope that cannot be removed. With improved handling and reload speed, the Lexington doesn’t have the best damage, but the addition of a headshot damage multiplier and its use of modifications allows players to use this weapon fairly well during stealth builds, and to those who want to take out lesser enemies with speed.

7 Guillotine X-MOD2

An Underestimated Fast-Firing SMG

Type

Power

Attack Speed

13

Damage

38

Reload Speed

1.4

Effective Range

35

Weapon Handling

8.1

Magazine Size

45

Effects

  • +125% Headshot Damage Multiplier

Iconic Modifier

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachment Slots

  • Muzzle
  • Mod
  • Mod

  • How to Get: Fast Travel to Longshore Stacks and climb to the roof of the containers, and use 20 Body Attribute Points to open a locked door for the stash.

The Guillotine X-MOD2 might be a bit of an agonizing weapon to obtain if players haven’t invested in the Body Attribute at all, but those who do manage to get it will find themselves with an SMG that, while not great, is still better than some other choices. With a large magazine size and an abundance of mods, Guillotine can impress as a potential elemental-damage-making fast-firing gun.

6 Claw X-MOD2

A Throwable Axe for Great Damage

Type

Axe

Attack Speed

2

Damage

165

Stamina Cost

8

Effective Range

26

Return Time

4.9

Effects

  • +125% Headshot Damage Multiplier
  • +25% Armor Penetration

Iconic Modifier

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachment Slots

  • Melee Mod
  • Melee Mod

  • How to Get: Found on the roof of the Heavy Hearts Club, Dogtown.

Another one of the X-MOD2 melee weapons is the Claw X-MOD2, a weapon that benefits mostly from its use as a throwable axe rather than against something sharp or blunt to really punish enemies found in Dogtown. With up to two mods and a decent layer of handling, this is an easy weapon to throw, but one without many builds to fit around its design.

5 Umbra X-MOD2

Decent Rate of Fire for a Power Assault Rifle

Type

Power

Attack Speed

11

Damage

37

Reload Speed

1.6

Effective Range

36

Weapon Handling

8.0

Magazine Size

30

Effects

  • +100% Headshot Damage Multiplier
  • +25% Armor Penetration

Iconic Modifier

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachment Slots

  • Muzzle
  • Mod
  • Mod

  • How to Get: Found past the electrical traps in the Wild Blue Hotel near the Terra Cognita Fast Travel Point.

While there are plenty of mods to aid the Umbra X-MOD2, it doesn’t perform nearly as well as the other Assault Rifle weapons, even if it has a rate of fire that can rival that of the fastest SMGs in the game. On its own, Umbra X-MOD2 is competent enough, and its generous mod slots allow for a fitting selection of greater damage and bullet penetration.

4 Cut-o-Matic X-MOD2

A Loud Melee Weapon to Rip and Tear

Type

Chainsword

Attack Speed

1.4

Damage per Hit

191

Stamina Cost

9.6

Effects

  • +50% Headshot Damage Multiplier
  • 1 sec Charge Time
  • +10% Burn Chance
  • Unsettling noise this weapon produces will alert enemies and cause civilians to panic.

Iconic Modifier

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachment Slots

  • Melee Mod
  • Melee Mod

  • How to Get: Found inside a man’s skull underneath the silver pillars of the ESC Explorer building in Terra Cognita.

Modding melee weapons is a lot of fun, and in the case of the Cut-o-Matic X-MOD2, that couldn’t be more apparent. Cut-o-Matic X-MOD2 is a chain blade that roars when equipped, scaring civilians and alerting hostiles immediately. However, with a weapon like this, players are going to want their enemies to know they are coming, for the right modifications will make for a fairer challenge with how fast this weapon hits and how powerful they can be.

3 Baseball Bat X-MOD2

Absurdly High Damage for a Homerun Weapon

Type

Two-Handed Club

Attack Speed

1.2

Damage per Hit

240

Stamina Cost

12

Effects

  • +25% Headshot Damage Multiplier
  • +10% Bleeding Chance

Iconic Modifier

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachment Slots

  • Melee Mod
  • Melee Mod

  • How to Get: Found on a rugged boardwalk near the Black Sapphire Club, Dogtown.

The Baseball Bat X-MOD2 is easy to find, and even easier to use, since all players need to do is swing it around so that it violently bashes and bruises their foes. With a generous bleeding chance and armor penetration, the Baseball Bat X-MOD2 can be made to subdue opponents before they realize the blunt force that has impacted them, and that’s without mentioning the beneficial modifications that can be equipped for greater melee variety.

2 Kyubi X-MOD2

A Great Assault Rifle Choice for Mods and Penetration

Type

Power

Attack Speed

5.0

Damage

71

Reload Speed

1.9

Effective Range

63

Weapon Handling

7.8

Magazine Size

16

Effects

  • +150% Headshot Damage Multiplier
  • +25% Armor Penetration

Iconic Modifier

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachment Slots

  • Scope
  • Muzzle
  • Mod
  • Mod

  • How to Get: Found at the bottom of a water hole near the Golden Pacific Fast Travel Point.

The Kyubi X-MOD2 might not take home the title as the king of the Assault Rifles, but it will do its job as a great soldier among the ranks. The Kyubi X-MOD2 is easy to obtain, which gives it bonus points, but performance-wise is what really matters. Different modifications allow for stealth or loud playstyles, and its generous damage, range, and handling make for a great medium-range weapon.

1 Pohzhar X-MOD2

The Fully Automatic Shotgun to Conquer Close-Range Combat

Type

Power

Attack Speed

3.6

Damage

166

Reload Speed

1.5

Effective Range

14

Weapon Handling

5.9

Magazine Size

10

Effects

  • +85% Headshot Damage Multiplier
  • +25% Armor Penetration
  • 6 Number of projectiles
  • Improves accuracy by changing irregular pellet spread into a more uniform, predictable pattern

Iconic Modifiers

A special version of the weapon capable of additional modification. Optimized design also allows for improved handling.

Attachments

  • Mod
  • Mod

  • How to Get: Inside a party room after 12 AM and before 5 AM, accessed by climbing the containers of a tall building near Elizabeth Kress Street in Longshore Stacks.

With a total of 6 projectiles and an incredible amount of handling, the Pohzhar X-MOD2 claims the title as one of the best Shotguns in Cyberpunk 2077, thanks to a mighty range of factors. With 6 projectiles, players can decimate their opponents, and with the added Perks from Body, Reflexes, and the cyberware modifications available to the weapon, players can have a tighter pellet spread for more gung-ho builds.

item.title: Schedule 1 Has Good News for Steam Deck Users
item.description:
Summary

  • Schedule 1 developer confirms Steam Deck support is in the works.
  • The game's solo developer has revealed he intends to work on the game's optimization in future updates.
  • A new update for Schedule 1 was released on April 10 with new content, gameplay tweaks, bug fixes, and more.

Schedule 1 developer TVGS has confirmed that it is working on getting the game Steam Deck verified with new optimization improvements. Currently, Schedule 1 is marked as "playable" on the Steam Deck, but has not been officially verified by Valve. However, a new update from the solo developer has revealed plans to further optimize the smash hit title specifically for Valve's handheld device.

Developer TVGS has created an unexpected smash hit with its new crime simulation title, quickly becoming one of the most-played games on Steam. Schedule 1 may have won over the hearts of players, achieving an "overwhelmingly positive" review score on Steam, but it hasn't been without issue. Shortly after the game's early access launch, Drug Deal Simulator publisher Movie Games S.A. revealed that it was investigating Schedule 1 for potential copyright infringement as the company believes TVGS may have used elements from Drug Deal Simulator , such as plot, mechanics, and user interface. While the investigation is ongoing, that hasn't stopped the solo developer from releasing new content updates.

Schedule 1 Developer Working on Steam Deck Verification

On April 10, TVGS launched a brand-new update for Schedule 1 . The latest patch included plenty of new content for the hit indie game, including new decorations, the ability to sell items at the Pawn Shop, and much more. Toward the end of the v0.3.4 patch notes, the developer revealed that he was working on improving the game's optimization and confirmed that he would "like to get Steam Deck officially supported." While it's unclear how long this may take, the developer said that they would like Schedule 1 to be Steam Deck verified as soon as possible. Currently, the game is marked as "playable" on Valve's handheld device, but there are numerous text and controller-related issues preventing it from being verified.

Although Schedule 1 isn't currently one of the many indie games with Steam Deck verification, many players do still play the title on the device with outstanding performance. As Schedule 1 is not a very graphically intensive title, the lower specs of the Steam Deck appear to run it anywhere between 40 and 60 frames per second with the correct settings. However, as Schedule 1 does not have official controller support, players are currently having to customize the controller layout via Steam Deck's built-in configuration settings. While TVGS has revealed it plans to improve Schedule 1 's optimization, which will hopefully improve Steam Deck performance, it's unclear if official controller support will also be added in a future update.

Despite being created by a single developer, Schedule 1 has been a massive hit on Steam since its early access launch on March 24. Just days after the game was released, it far exceeded expectations with over 130,000 concurrent players. Then, on April 6, Schedule 1 continued to soar in popularity with over 459,000 concurrent players, making it one of the most-played games on Steam. Fans continue to praise the title, with over 92,000 reviews as of writing, Schedule 1 boasts an impressive "overwhelmingly positive" score on the platform.

item.title: Roblox: Cautious Clippers Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Cautious Clippers Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Cautious Clippers
  • How to Get More Cautious Clippers Codes

Cautious Clippers is a well-made hair salon simulator in the tycoon genre, where you will need to serve customers, hire staff, and grow your business. To unlock more game content, you'll need a lot of cash, for example, to make upgrades or buy new areas or skin crates.

Redeeming Cautious Clippers codes can help you with all these expenses, as it will bring a lot of useful rewards, including Cash. Hurry up because like in other Roblox games, Cautious Clippers codes have a certain expiration date, after which they become invalid and do not offer rewards.

Updated April 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Right now, there's only one active code, but it still provides a helpful reward. If you need some extra Cash, make sure to redeem it while it's available. More codes may be added in the future, so keeping an eye on updates is a good idea. Check back later to see if any new rewards appear.

All Cautious Clippers Codes

Working Cautious Clippers Codes

  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.

Expired Cautious Clippers Codes

There are currently no expired Cautious Clippers codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

If you are a beginner, be sure to redeem Cautious Clippers codes. This will bring you a decent amount of cash, as well as other useful rewards, such as Crates, from which you can get skins that will increase your efficiency when serving customers.

How to Redeem Codes for Cautious Clippers

As with other Roblox experiences, redeeming codes from Cautious Clippers won't take much time and is generally easy. However, if you have any difficulties or don't know how the redemption system works, you can use our guide:

  • Launch Cautious Clippers .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. Below the currency counters, you will see several buttons arranged in two columns. Among them, interact with the second button in the first column, which says Shop.
  • Once you open the Shop menu, click on the Codes button. It is located to the right above the Shop menu.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Redeem button. Now, copy and paste one of the active codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Cautious Clippers Codes

You can easily find more Roblox codes on the game's official social media pages. It won't take you much time; all you need to do is carefully monitor the pages we've collected for you below:

  • Official Cautious Clippers Roblox group.
  • Official Cautious Clippers game page.
  • Official Cautious Clippers Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: Sword Clashers Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
In this game, players will have to fight waves of enemies and unlock new worlds. But of course, at first, your character will be quite weak. And to increase their stats, you will have to train a lot. Fortunately, with the help of Sword Clashers codes you will speed up your progress significantly.

Just a few codes will reward you with a lot of useful items. This includes both currencies and unique weapons. But if you do not want to miss out on these goodies, you should use Roblox codes before they expire.

Updated April 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are plenty of codes available, offering a mix of Gems, special swords, and limited-time items. Whether you're looking to boost your resources or collect unique rewards, these codes can be useful. Be sure to redeem them before they expire, as they may not last forever. More updates could bring additional freebies, so check back later.

All Sword Clashers Codes

Working Sword Clashers Codes

  • Halloween - Redeem this code to get 2 Pumpkin Eggs.
  • howdy - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • upsidedown - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • indagrass - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • lookup - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • spike - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • silo - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • molten - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • supportbeam - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • doofus - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • Timber - Redeem this code to get a Timber Axe Sword.
  • Release - Redeem this code to get 50 Gems and a Shiny Treat

Expired Sword Clashers Codes

There are no expired codes in Sword Clashers . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Sword Clashers gameplay is similar to other RPGs on the platform. Players need to train on dummies to increase their damage, and then fight enemies to earn Wins. The latter are needed to unlock new worlds and hatch pets. In addition, you can find weapons with better damage multipliers. But the best way to get weapons easily is Sword Clashers codes.

Each of the codes contains useful items and even Gems. With their help, you can make your character much stronger, especially in the early stages of the game. But you should hurry since each code has a short validity period.

How to Redeem Sword Clashers Codes

Fortunately, using codes in Sword Clashers is no more difficult than in other Roblox experiences. But if you are a little confused by the abundance of HUD elements, then follow these simple steps:

  • First, of course, launch Sword Clashers .
  • Then, open the settings. To do this, players can click on the gear icon in the lower-left corner of the screen.
  • After that, go to the Redeem tab.
  • Finally, enter the code and click the Redeem! button to get free goodies.

How to Get More Sword Clashers Codes

Since the developers do not release many Sword Clashers codes, they are very valuable. Therefore, we recommend that you follow the developers' social media, so as not to miss the release of free rewards. In addition to Roblox codes, on these pages, you will find news about upcoming updates.

  • TBlox Studios X page
  • TBlox Studios Discord server
  • TBlox Mini Roblox group

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Games Needs To Find A Healthy Balance
item.description:
While it might be good news that the Nintendo Switch 2 will feature updated versions of some original Switch games, a potential imbalance between these new editions may already be forming that Nintendo should keep an eye on. Though the focus of the Nintendo Switch 2 has been on its next-gen games, Nintendo has also ensured the longevity of previous Switch games as it transitions to its new console. For games like The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Tears of the Kingdom, and Kirby and the Forgotten Land , Nintendo has confirmed these will receive new Switch 2 Editions, and many more may follow.

However, among the Switch 2 Editions revealed or rumored so far, there seems to be some disparities in what players receive when upgrading certain Switch games. For example, while virtually all new editions will feature improved graphics and performance thanks to the Switch 2's hardware, only a select few have been confirmed to include additional content exclusive to the Switch 2, such as Kirby and the Forgotten Land + Star-Crossed World . While it may not be an immediate concern ahead of the Switch 2's launch later this year, Nintendo should aim to manage expectations for developers and players regarding Switch 2 Editions games.

Breaking Down The Differences In Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Games

Beyond various Switch games receiving free updates when played on the Switch 2, according to Nintendo's website, there are just under a dozen confirmed or speculated Switch 2 Edition games in the works for the upcoming console. Several have already been showcased by Nintendo, such as Breath of the Wild and Tears of the Kingdom enhanced gameplay or Kirby 's upcoming Star-Crossed World expansion, while others like Pokemon Legends: Z-A or Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar will need additional updates. However, even among the Switch 2 Editions confirmed so far, it seems some games are getting a better deal than others.

For instance, while Metroid Prime 4: Beyond and both Zelda games will receive performance improvements and quality-of-life features, they won't receive any new story content. Meanwhile, games like Kirby and the Forgotten Land will receive expansions similar to Super Mario 3D World + Bowser 's Fury, and Super Mario Party Jamboree + Jamboree TV will feature Switch 2 exclusive minigames. Ultimately, this suggests that some Switch 2 Editions will be better value for money if some only offer minor or superficial improvements, even in cases where players had been anticipating expansions or DLC for games like Tears of the Kingdom .

Nintendo Should Standardize Its Switch 2 Edition Games

While it may not be possible for Nintendo to include new content in every Switch 2 Edition, it should either moderate how much can be added in these updated versions or ensure that costs reflect any new content. Based on Nintendo's original Japanese listings and recent reports about prices for Switch 2 upgrade packs, Nintendo seems to at least be taking the latter approach, with some editions being free with Nintendo Switch Online membership or varying in price between ten dollars or more depending on the game. However, with no clear standards or baselines for content and pricing, this could become an issue for Nintendo.

Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Games Could Be A Temporary But Necessary Evil

Ever since the latest Nintendo Direct, there has been significant controversy around the prices of the Switch 2 itself and its games, and things may potentially get worse following Nintendo's delays to US pre-orders in response to uncertainty over tariffs. But Nintendo would arguably receive criticism over the Switch 2 regardless of any steps it took to mitigate controversy, as game prices have been increasing across the industry and backwards compatibility remains a hot-button topic. Therefore, these upgraded editions may only be a temporary but necessary evil until both Nintendo and its players fully transition to the Switch 2.
